name: Snale
description: Abdul-Rahman Siemen the snail is hungry! He'll move towards and eat the nearest piece of clover. Pick up the four-leaf clovers and place them so he avoids the salt! Move the screen by hammering the arrow keys like a maniac to find more clover. Made for Galway Game Jam 14, 21st-22nd September 2019. Featuring the vocal talents of Darren Kierney and a lovely photo by Jeremy Thomas.
